notesStmt.note: Rāmamānasapūjā, the 35th chapter (adhyāya) of the Agastisaṁhitā [Agastyasaṁhitā]. Title from colophon, which also refers to Agastisaṁhitā as "Sūtīkṣṇasaṁvāda." Cover folio reads: "rāmā 'ryā. jaya rāma. rāmacandra."
Fair condition. Browned paper and crumbling edges. Some holes. Mistakes blotched out with black. Marginal corrections. Colophon continues into margin.

Begins (f. 1v): śrīgaṇeśāya namaḥ. śrīrāmo jayati carācaraikabandhuḥ sutīkṣṇa uvāca hṛdaye mānasīpūjā kīdṛśī vā vada prabho. upacaraiḥ katividhaiḥ pūjyate raghunandanaḥ (verse 1). agastya unvāca. rāmaṁ padmaviśālākṣaṁ nīḷāmbudasamaprabhaṁ smitavaktraṁ sukhāsīnaṁ cintayeccintitāptaye (verse 2).
Ends (f. 7v): kiṁ punaḥ satataṁ kuryād brahmaṇyevaschito hi saḥ. sarvakāmān avāpnoti ceha loke paratra ca (verse 64).
